guidanceItem.title: Administrators are required to log on locally OR the remote administration solution is secure.
guidanceItem.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that if local administration is performed, the administrator account to log on interactively is provided by removing the Access this computer from the network privilege.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
